title: How to use Java Mission Control to monitor Java apps
content: This article is whirlwind tour across the Java Flight Recorder (JFR) and the Java Mission Control (JMC) suite. At the end of it, you will be able to monitor, collect diagnostic data and profile any running Java application. What is Java Flight Recorder? Firstly, why do we need another tool to monitor Java ? As ...  The post appeared first on .
